dev and prod deployment workflows.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use dotnetisolated for SWA API deployment

The SWA CLI requires `--api-language dotnetisolated` \(no dash\) for .NET
isolated functions, not `--api-language dotnet`. This was causing the API
to not be deployed properly, resulting in 404 errors on all API endpoints.

Per Azure SWA CLI documentation, the naming convention differs between
CLI flags \(dotnetisolated\) and config files \(dotnet-isolated:8.0\).

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/Ben.Grossman/Code/against-the-spread-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add test auth bypass for cloud E2E testing

- Add ENABLE_TEST_AUTH environment variable support in Terraform
- Create TestAuthFunction.cs for mock /.auth/me endpoint in test mode
- Update AuthHelper.cs to check X-Test-User-Email header when test auth enabled
- Add loginWithTestAuth\(\) method to AdminPage for cloud E2E tests
- Update TestEnvironment with cloud detection and authenticateViaSignIn helper
- Refactor all E2E test specs to use environment-aware authentication
- Enable test auth in dev.tfvars \(never enable in production\)

This allows E2E tests to run against deployed cloud environments by
bypassing Azure SWA''s real Google OAuth with a test auth header.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/Ben.Grossman/Code/against-the-spread-v2 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Mock /.auth/me for frontend auth state in cloud E2E tests

The test auth bypass was setting X-Test-User-Email header for API calls
but the frontend still showed the login button because /.auth/me returned
null. Now we intercept /.auth/me and return a mock clientPrincipal so the
frontend shows the authenticated state.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
